hero.title: Tradition. Innovation. Impact.
hero.description: House of Ravya was born to celebrate Indian artisanal traditions while building a responsible, modern supply chain.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Based in India and working closely with rural artisans, we blend natural materials, intentional design, and ethical manufacturing practices. Our name, Ravya ‚Äì meaning ‚Äúsun-born‚Äù ‚Äì reflects our philosophy: grounded, radiant, and full of life. We exist to revive artisanal voices while yearning for authenticity in every stitch.
